project_summary.title: Where is the question - Chrome Extension
project_summary.purpose: This extension helps users navigate long chat histories in ChatGPT and Gemini by placing markers on the scrollbar for each user question. Clicking a marker scrolls to that question.

gemini_development.key_challenge: Identifying the correct and stable HTML selectors for user messages on the Gemini website, as the site uses dynamic class names.
gemini_development.future_debugging_notes: Refer to GEMINI_DEV_NOTES.md for a full summary and a guide on how to debug future issues with Gemini integration.
